data.oai_dc:dc: Isotopic, color, and GPS data from Marietas Islands brown boobies

Data file containing carbon stable isotope data, gulag skin color data, and GPS data collected from brown boobies studied in 2012 and 2016 from the Marietas Islands off the Pacific coast of Mexico. Samples and color data were collected in the field, and GPS data and isotopic samples were processed post-fieldwork season.
